attributes.action: Stop £1000 payments to some employers who do not require it.
attributes.additional_details: It’s disgraceful that some companies will profit from this scheme when so many others are suffering
attributes.background: Stop £1000 payments to employers who have already brought furloughed staff back and put it to a better use.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly which businesses you would like to be ineligible for the £1000 bonus. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
